title: Relates to the offenses of vehicular assault and vehicular manslaughter
summary: Expands the offenses of vehicular assault and vehicular manslaughter to include injury or death caused while operating a motor vehicle after repeated violation of certain vehicle and traffic offenses or with a suspended license.
